modName: Dark MD Knight plate Saint edition
summary: Simple darker retexture. More coming for this particular armor.
descriptionHtml:
I'm about to try and convert this armor into a Maxamillian lookalike. We will see how that goes. I decided I would upload the color scheme I will be using, just in case anyone wants a darker version of the amazing 

Knight Plate armor by Medtech. Thank you Medtech.
https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/90850

You will need her mod for this to work. Get her mod through NMM, and then manually download my mod and replace the texture.

As always, this mod is of course available to male characters, but its kinda geared towards the heavily armored practical female type. 

This is later going to be the home of a few other major texture changes, so look out for that.
In the meantime enjoy a little dark purple and steel.  You need to equip the helmet twice for it to shine, for some reason. But it works fine after that. 

The images that are with the skyrim ones are a teaser of what is to come... well hopefully. We will see how it turns out.

In the inventory it appears to have a second armored augmentation near the left armpit/ This however does not show up in use. The armor is symmetric.
author: gethesmain AKA Michael Smith
